inclusion.criterion: Histologically confirmed metastatic cancer of the prostate (stage D2 or Tx Nx M1 ≠ M1a) with measurable bone or visceral (lung, liver, etc.) metastases
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: radiographic conformation was necessary in the event of a questionable bone scan detection in conjunction with only slightly elevated PSA levels [at least 20 ng/mL or less than or equal to 50 ng/mL]

inclusion.criterion: Metastatic cancer of the prostate requiring first-line therapy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Pre-assessment PSA 5-fold or higher than the standard level set by the central laboratory, that is, PSA greater than or equal to (≥) 20 ng/mL as quantitated by the Hybritech radioimmunoassay (normal is less than [<] 4 ng/mL)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: ECOG performance status of no more than 2
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Normal testosterone levels according to the central laboratory standards
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Aspartate transaminase (AST) and alanine transaminase (ALT) < 2.25-fold higher than the standard levels set by the central laboratory (except when liver metastases were present)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Anticipated life expectancy greater than 9 months
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Criteria for Continuous or Intermittent Treatment Phase - Subjects who meet the pre-assessment criteria and who has PSA < 4 ng/mL after 6 months of induction therapy
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Subject refuse to sign the informed consent form or is likely to be uncooperative or not to comply with the obligations set out in the study protocol
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Subject has received prior hormonal (and neoadjuvant) treatment prompting medical castration (estrogens, hormone-releasing hormone agonists, androgens) or has undergone surgical castration
exclusion.label: triggers
